verbs.description: heads or tails to [V: drink] [ARG1: coin] flip to settle kentucky vote for at least the third time this year a coin flip will be used to break a tied kentucky vote a coin flip thursday is expected to decide whether perry county in buckhorn lake state park is allowed to sell alcohol after a local referendum ended in a tie the park and 1 200-acre lake is nestled in a dry precinct about 50 miles 80 kilometers from the virginia border the tuesday vote was 155 - 155 state law allows tie votes to be settled with a coin flip martin county kentucky martin county ky logan county kentucky barry perkins 1200 acre lake virginia perry county kentucky jim glenn buckhorn kentucky coin margaret sprague perry hubert spence rosa pollard 1 200-acre lake daviess county kentucky d j johnson perry county buckhorn logan county officer boyce coles buckhorn lake state park heads or tails
